entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:27 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of snow early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 14 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
